name: Bosley Medical New York
overview: Bosley Medical has a New York branch that provides hair restoration treatment to patients from all over the world. One of the busiest of all Bosley’s surgical center, the team of 3 full time physicians and clinical staff employ time-tested and state-of-the-art follicular unit transplantation techniques in performing hair transplant procedures. The New York office also performs a high volume of transplant procedures by the follicular unit extraction method. All patients that come through Bosley receive personal and private consultation with a free hair & scalp analysis, a medical guide to take home, followed by an interactive session about the hair loss problem and its solution with a hair specialist. The team is well-versed with the latest in hair transplant technology. With the active support of capable and experienced clinical staff, the patients are ensured to be as comfortable and relaxed as possible, during their consultation and/or procedure Bosley Medical New York is located in Manhattan. This prime location enables the patient to stay in the area’s best hotels.
